metadata.title: CVE-2021-3574 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in ImageMagick-7.0.11-5, where executing acrafted file with the convert command, ASAN detects memory leaks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3574` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagick++-6.q16-9t64 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-9t64 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6.q16-7-extra - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6.q16-7t64 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-7-extra - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-7t64 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickwand-6.q16-7t64 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-7t64 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
perlmagick - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu1').
